MALAYSIA SHORTS

News aggregated and shorten to save your precious time!

  • OPEC‚ÄôS OIL CUTS FORCE THE US TO RECONSIDER ITS FOREIGN POLICY

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/opec-oil-cuts-force-us-093618810.html

    42.11% Shortened!

    OPEC+ announced it‚Äôll slash output by 2 million barrels per day (bpd) on Wednesday (Oct

    The White House‚Äôs reaction was swift, calling the decision ‚Äúshortsighted‚Äù and accusing the oil cartel of ‚Äúaligning with Russia.‚Äù Saudi Arabia, which controls about one-third of OPEC‚Äôs oil reserves and is seen as a US ally, has not heeded president Joe Biden‚Äôs plea against taking such a drastic step

    Anticipation of OPEC‚Äôs decision this week has already lifted oil prices to more than $90 a barrel

    The cut in production, in reality, will be lower than 2 million because OPEC and its allies have been underproducing

    In August, the coalition missed its targets by 3.58 million barrels per day

    In Nigeria, for instance, oil production hit a 32-year-low amid pipeline vandalism and theft

    Earlier, in May, Biden reached into the US‚Äôs Strategic Petroleum Reserve to keep oil prices, and therefore petrol prices, in check

    After the OPEC+ cuts, he might have to resort to releasing more oil again

    They argue a ban would ‚Äúdecrease inventory levels, reduce domestic refining capacity, put upward pressure on consumer fuel prices, and alienate US allies during a time of war.‚Äù üáªüá™The US is looking to ease sanctions on Venezuela to allow Chevron, the last major US oil producer operating in the country, to pump oil there

    Millions of barrels of Venezuelan oil could make up for lost Russian supplies

    üõ¢Ô∏èFalling oil prices are prompting OPEC to take drastic measures ü§ëThe White House will lower gas prices today by purchasing oil tomorrow üìâ Lower gas prices are making Americans feel better about everything else

    ['opec', 'million', 'barrel', 'oil', 'biden']

    OPEC+ announced it‚Äôll slash output by 2 million barrels per day (bpd) on Wednesday (Oct

    The White House‚Äôs reaction was swift, calling the decision ‚Äúshortsighted‚Äù and accusing the oil cartel of ‚Äúaligning with Russia.‚Äù Saudi Arabia, which controls about one-third of OPEC‚Äôs oil reserves and is seen as a US ally, has not heeded president Joe Biden‚Äôs plea against taking such a drastic step

    Anticipation of OPEC‚Äôs decision this week has already lifted oil prices to more than $90 a barrel

    The cut in production, in reality, will be lower than 2 million because OPEC and its allies have been underproducing

    In August, the coalition missed its targets by 3.58 million barrels per day

    In Nigeria, for instance, oil production hit a 32-year-low amid pipeline vandalism and theft

    Earlier, in May, Biden reached into the US‚Äôs Strategic Petroleum Reserve to keep oil prices, and therefore petrol prices, in check

  • SELANGOR SULTAN: RIGHTS OF NON-MUSLIMS MUST BE CONSIDERED IN RELIGIOUS DECISIONS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/06/selangor-sultan-rights-of-non-muslims-must-be-considered-in-religious-decisions

    10/06/2022, 16:36

    60.71% Shortened!

    The Selangor Sultan, who is also the National Council of Islamic Religious Affairs (MKI) chairman, said the MKI muzakarah committee played a very important role and function in the Muslim community in Malaysia and is a tower of legal reference at the national and international levels

    However, since each state had its own fatwa committee, there is bound to be conflicts between state fatwas and muzakarah decisions at the national level as well as between one state and another

    "This legal ruling by the muzakarah committee is a collective ijtihad (ijtihad jama'i) of all the muftis of the states assisted by experts in certain fields," said Sultan Sharafuddin in his speech during the 121st MKI muzakarah committee meeting at Masjid Sultan Salahuddin Abdul Aziz Shah, Shah Alam, Selangor on Wednesday (Oct 6)

    Sultan Sharafuddin added that the coordination and standardisation of fatwas by the muzakarah committee do not touch or affect the authority of the Sultan and Rulers in the states as the Head of Religion, as stated by Regulation 9 (1) of the MKI Regulations 2022

    According to procedure, the decisions and views of the muzakarah committee would be informed to the MKI, which was chaired by Sultan Sharafuddin

    "Any statement regarding the decision made by the MKI muzakarah committee can only be made by the muzakarah chairman

    "This is important to ensure that muzakarah decisions at the national level and fatwas at the state level are not influenced by elements of party politics," said Sultan Sharafuddin

    He added that Jakim only acts as the secretariat of the MKI muzakarah committee

    Sultan Sharafuddin also advised muftis to refrain from religious disputes in the public space, especially if the issue had been decided on together in the muzakarah space

    "Appropriately, the differences of opinion of these scholars should only be discussed in the muzakarah and are not brought out of the muzakarah court," said Sultan Sharafuddin

    Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah

    ['muzakarah', 'sultan', 'sharafuddin', 'mki', 'committee']

    The Selangor Sultan, who is also the National Council of Islamic Religious Affairs (MKI) chairman, said the MKI muzakarah committee played a very important role and function in the Muslim community in Malaysia and is a tower of legal reference at the national and international levels

    However, since each state had its own fatwa committee, there is bound to be conflicts between state fatwas and muzakarah decisions at the national level as well as between one state and another

    "This legal ruling by the muzakarah committee is a collective ijtihad (ijtihad jama'i) of all the muftis of the states assisted by experts in certain fields," said Sultan Sharafuddin in his speech during the 121st MKI muzakarah committee meeting at Masjid Sultan Salahuddin Abdul Aziz Shah, Shah Alam, Selangor on Wednesday (Oct 6)

    Sultan Sharafuddin added that the coordination and standardisation of fatwas by the muzakarah committee do not touch or affect the authority of the Sultan and Rulers in the states as the Head of Religion, as stated by Regulation 9 (1) of the MKI Regulations 2022

    According to procedure, the decisions and views of the muzakarah committee would be informed to the MKI, which was chaired by Sultan Sharafuddin

    "Any statement regarding the decision made by the MKI muzakarah committee can only be made by the muzakarah chairman

    "This is important to ensure that muzakarah decisions at the national level and fatwas at the state level are not influenced by elements of party politics," said Sultan Sharafuddin

    He added that Jakim only acts as the secretariat of the MKI muzakarah committee

    Sultan Sharafuddin also advised muftis to refrain from religious disputes in the public space, especially if the issue had been decided on together in the muzakarah space

    "Appropriately, the differences of opinion of these scholars should only be discussed in the muzakarah and are not brought out of the muzakarah court," said Sultan Sharafuddin

    Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah

    ['muzakarah', 'sultan', 'sharafuddin', 'mki', 'committee']



  • RICH MAINLAND CHINESE SNAP UP LUXURY HOMES IN SINGAPORE DESPITE TAX HIKES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/10/06/rich-mainland-chinese-snap-up-luxury-homes-in-singapore-despite-tax-hikes

    10/06/2022, 16:06

    60.71% Shortened!

    Mainland Chinese buyers accounted for about one-fifth of the 425 luxury units - defined as costing more than S$5 million ($3.52 million)- sold from January to August this year

    Singapore has long been a magnet for the mega-rich, wooed by the Southeast-Asian city-state's stable politics, strong currency, and reputation as a safe haven to park assets, analysts said

    Singapore's property prices have also tended to accelerate gradually, with few booms and wild busts seen in other popular markets

    All in, the number of luxury units sold to foreigners in Singapore in the first eight months of this year - including those with permanent residency - has outpaced the 282 in the same period in pre-pandemic 2019 and the 322 in 2018

    The data, from the Urban Redevelopment Authority and property consultancy OrangeTee & Tie, show that Singapore property remains popular among foreigners despite the government raising taxes for purchases last December

    In a bulk purchase in June, one Chinese tycoon splurged over S$85 million on 20 new units in central Singapore, while another Chinese buyer snapped up four units for around S$60 million

    The number of family offices increased from 400 at the end of 2020 to 700 last year

    Nicholas Mak, head of research and consultancy at ERA Realty Network, said mainland Chinese and Malaysians were the two biggest buyers of Singapore property before the pandemic

    The Singapore dollar with its history of being a stable currency also encourages foreigners to park assets in Singapore, said Mak

    Since Singapore progressively opened its borders from last year, there has been a flood of relocations to the country including from Hong Kong, where COVID restrictions were still tight

    Home rents have risen to a seven-year high in Singapore, already one of the world's most expensive cities, even though its population has dipped in the past two years

    ['singapore', 'chinese', 'buyer', 'property', 'year']

    Mainland Chinese buyers accounted for about one-fifth of the 425 luxury units - defined as costing more than S$5 million ($3.52 million)- sold from January to August this year

    Singapore has long been a magnet for the mega-rich, wooed by the Southeast-Asian city-state's stable politics, strong currency, and reputation as a safe haven to park assets, analysts said

    Singapore's property prices have also tended to accelerate gradually, with few booms and wild busts seen in other popular markets

    All in, the number of luxury units sold to foreigners in Singapore in the first eight months of this year - including those with permanent residency - has outpaced the 282 in the same period in pre-pandemic 2019 and the 322 in 2018

    The data, from the Urban Redevelopment Authority and property consultancy OrangeTee & Tie, show that Singapore property remains popular among foreigners despite the government raising taxes for purchases last December

    In a bulk purchase in June, one Chinese tycoon splurged over S$85 million on 20 new units in central Singapore, while another Chinese buyer snapped up four units for around S$60 million

    The number of family offices increased from 400 at the end of 2020 to 700 last year

    Nicholas Mak, head of research and consultancy at ERA Realty Network, said mainland Chinese and Malaysians were the two biggest buyers of Singapore property before the pandemic

    The Singapore dollar with its history of being a stable currency also encourages foreigners to park assets in Singapore, said Mak

    Since Singapore progressively opened its borders from last year, there has been a flood of relocations to the country including from Hong Kong, where COVID restrictions were still tight

    Home rents have risen to a seven-year high in Singapore, already one of the world's most expensive cities, even though its population has dipped in the past two years

    ['singapore', 'chinese', 'buyer', 'property', 'year']



  • STEPFATHER SEXUALLY ASSAULTS GIRL IN FRONT OF STUDENTS IN ONLINE CLASS, US COPS SAY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/tech/tech-news/2022/10/06/stepfather-sexually-assaults-girl-in-front-of-students-in-online-class-us-cops-say

    10/06/2022, 13:36

    47.62% Shortened!

    The teen‚Äôs Ohio Virtual Academy social studies teacher and 39 classmates saw the man approach the victim from behind, according to a Berea police report

    ‚Äî Photo by Sigmund on Unsplash A 16-year-old girl was attending an online class when her stepfather sexually assaulted her on camera, according to police in Ohio

    The teen‚Äôs Ohio Virtual Academy social studies teacher and 39 classmates saw the man approach her from behind, according to a Berea police report

    She also looked into the student‚Äôs file and learned the girl‚Äôs stepfather was a registered sex offender, police said

    He was previously convicted of rape and gross sexual imposition of a nine-year-old girl

    He was arrested on a charge of sexual imposition

    McClatchy News is not naming the stepfather to protect the identity of the teen girl

    The man has pleaded not guilty to sexual imposition and posted his bond of US$50,000 (RM231,550), according to WOIO

    ‚ÄúOhio Virtual Academy (OHVA) is aware of the unfortunate incident last week, immediately reached out to the parents, and is continuing to work closely with the appropriate authorities,‚Äù Head of School Kristin Stewart said in a statement to McClatchy News

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright ¬© 1995-

  • LET THE ECONOMY RECOVER FIRST BEFORE CALLING POLLS, SAYS AZMIN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/06/let-the-economy-recover-first-before-calling-polls-says-azmin

    10/06/2022, 12:03

    47.62% Shortened!

    Thursday, 06 Oct 2022

    Azmin noted that whoever forms the new government after the 15th General Election (GE15) would implement the CPTPP

    "Nevertheless, if Parliament is dissolved and GE15 is held, I am confident that the CPTPP will benefit the nation and the people

    "Whoever forms the new government after the national polls will act for the welfare of the nation and people," he said

    He also said 11 laws were already amended which would allow the country to fulfill its obligations under the CPTPP

    Earlier, to a question by Wong Hon Wai (PH-Bukit Bendera), Azmin said Malaysia has ratified the CPTPP and officially submitted the instrument of ratification with the CPTPP depositary in New Zealand on Sept 30

    "The CPTPP is considered ratified for Malaysia and it will come into force on Nov 29 this year," he added

    The CPTPP was signed on March 8, 2018 and had been ratified and implemented in stages by Australia, Canada, Japan, Mexico, New Zealand, Singapore, Vietnam and Peru

    The agreement would allow Malaysia to gain priority access to new markets in Canada, Mexico and Peru

    Apart from the CPTPP, Azmin said Malaysia and Turkiye inked an agreement on Sept 29 to expand bilateral trade in the service, e-commerce and investment sectors

    He also told the House that Malaysia would hold talks with the European Union later this month to resume free trade talks which were stalled since 2012

    ['say', 'azmin', 'trade', 'cptpp', 'would']

    Thursday, 06 Oct 2022

    Azmin noted that whoever forms the new government after the 15th General Election (GE15) would implement the CPTPP

    "Nevertheless, if Parliament is dissolved and GE15 is held, I am confident that the CPTPP will benefit the nation and the people

    "Whoever forms the new government after the national polls will act for the welfare of the nation and people," he said

    He also said 11 laws were already amended which would allow the country to fulfill its obligations under the CPTPP

    Earlier, to a question by Wong Hon Wai (PH-Bukit Bendera), Azmin said Malaysia has ratified the CPTPP and officially submitted the instrument of ratification with the CPTPP depositary in New Zealand on Sept 30

    "The CPTPP is considered ratified for Malaysia and it will come into force on Nov 29 this year," he added

    The CPTPP was signed on March 8, 2018 and had been ratified and implemented in stages by Australia, Canada, Japan, Mexico, New Zealand, Singapore, Vietnam and Peru

    The agreement would allow Malaysia to gain priority access to new markets in Canada, Mexico and Peru

    Apart from the CPTPP, Azmin said Malaysia and Turkiye inked an agreement on Sept 29 to expand bilateral trade in the service, e-commerce and investment sectors

    He also told the House that Malaysia would hold talks with the European Union later this month to resume free trade talks which were stalled since 2012

    ['say', 'azmin', 'trade', 'cptpp', 'would']

    The confluence of the Fibonacci 38.2% one-day and pivot point one-week R2 at $1,712 will be a tough nut to crack for XAU bears

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/chips-down-not-2-strong-170105130.html

    74.42% Shortened!

    With help from the TipRanks database, we can see that Mosesmann is certainly not alone in his bullish stance; both are rated as Strong Buys by the analyst consensus too

    Revenue increased by 41% year-over-year to a record $1.52 billion, while adj

    EPS of $0.57 was up from the $0.34 delivered in the same period last year

    For the October quarter, Marvell guided for revenue of $1.56 billion, below the $1.585 billion expected on Wall Street

    That is not a concern for Mosesmann, who remains ‚Äúbullish‚Äù on the company‚Äôs prospects

    (To watch Mosesmann‚Äôs track record, click here) Most are echoing Mosesmann‚Äôs sentiment; barring 3 fencesitters, all 17 other recent analyst reviews are positive, making the consensus view here a Strong Buy

    The average target stands at $71.20 and could generate returns of ~49% in the year ahead

    (See Marvell stock forecast on TipRanks) Lattice Semiconductor (LSCC) Next up, we have Lattice Semiconductor, a maker of low power, field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs)

    The latest set of results - for F2Q22 - showed $161.37 million at the top-line, a 28.2% year-over-year increase

    EPS of $0.42, also up from the $0.25 delivered in the same quarter last year

    The forecast calls for one-year gains of ~37%, considering the average target stands at $75.17

  • 5 REASONS WHY THE STOCK MARKET SUDDENLY ROARED BACK

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/5-reasons-why-the-stock-market-100658950.html

    60.0% Shortened!

    It has been a rip-your-face off rally in the stock market to kick off the final quarter of the year, much to the surprise of the bears who ruled the roost in September and third quarter

    At a 5% gain so far this week, the S&P 500 (^GSPC) had its best back-to-back days since April 2020 and the best two-day start to the fourth quarter going back to the first full year of the five-day trading week in 1953, according to data from Bespoke

    Here are those reasons, with analysis from us at Yahoo Finance

    The euro is almost back to par with the dollar at 0.9983

    The British pound has rallied from its V-bottom low on September 26 at $1.07, back to $1.15." The U.S

    manufacturing data earlier this week also showed an easing in economic activity and pricing pressure, spurring markets on the hopes the Fed would cool the pace of rate hikes sooner

    "The next Fed meeting is not until November 2, so markets can focus on earnings rather than monetary policy." Hawkish rhetoric from Fed members last week tanked the market, so less of their musings could bring further short-term relief to markets

    That mission was reinforced in the past week by the tough-sounding commentary from various Fed officials including Fed Chair Jerome Powell and Vice Chair Lael Brainard

    Wall Street is now bracing for a policy mistake from central bankers

    Thus, even if the Federal Reserve (Fed) pivots or inflation softens in the fourth quarter, which may energize a risk-on rally, it likely does not change the downward trajectory of the economy and challenging market backdrop over the medium term." Brian Sozzi is an editor-at-large and anchor at Yahoo Finance

    Follow Sozzi on Twitter @BrianSozzi and on LinkedIn

    Click here for the latest stock market news and in-depth analysis, including events that move stocks Read the latest financial and business news from Yahoo Finance Download the Yahoo Finance app for Apple or Android Follow Yahoo Finance on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Flipboard, LinkedIn, and YouTube

    ['market', 'year', 'week', 'back', 'yahoo']

    At a 5% gain so far this week, the S&P 500 (^GSPC) had its best back-to-back days since April 2020 and the best two-day start to the fourth quarter going back to the first full year of the five-day trading week in 1953, according to data from Bespoke

    Here are those reasons, with analysis from us at Yahoo Finance

    The euro is almost back to par with the dollar at 0.9983

    The British pound has rallied from its V-bottom low on September 26 at $1.07, back to $1.15." The U.S

    manufacturing data earlier this week also showed an easing in economic activity and pricing pressure, spurring markets on the hopes the Fed would cool the pace of rate hikes sooner

    "The next Fed meeting is not until November 2, so markets can focus on earnings rather than monetary policy." Hawkish rhetoric from Fed members last week tanked the market, so less of their musings could bring further short-term relief to markets

    That mission was reinforced in the past week by the tough-sounding commentary from various Fed officials including Fed Chair Jerome Powell and Vice Chair Lael Brainard

    Wall Street is now bracing for a policy mistake from central bankers

    Thus, even if the Federal Reserve (Fed) pivots or inflation softens in the fourth quarter, which may energize a risk-on rally, it likely does not change the downward trajectory of the economy and challenging market backdrop over the medium term."   • 'HE'S NOT HUMAN!' COPENHAGEN GOALKEEPER KAMIL GRABARA LEFT ASTOUDED BY ERLING HAALAND'S QUALITY

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11285173/Hes-not-human-Copenhagen-goalkeeper-Kamil-Grabara-left-astouded-Erling-Haalands-quality.html

    Do you want to automatically post your MailOnline comments to your Facebook Timeline? Your comment will be posted to MailOnline as usual We will automatically post your comment and a link to the news story to your Facebook timeline at the same time it is posted on MailOnline

    To do this we will link your MailOnline account with your Facebook account

    We‚Äôll ask you to confirm this for your first post to Facebook

    You can choose on each post whether you would like it to be posted to Facebook

    ['mailonline', 'comment', 'city', 'say', 'post']

    A check on the Interpol website in both his family name and country did not yield any results

    On Tuesday (Oct 4), Hamzah when replying to a question by Kepong Member of Parliament Lim Lip Eng said that Malaysia will not offer rewards for information leading to Jho Low, Lim queried if the Royal Malaysian Police (PDRM) had contacted American journalists Tom Wright and his colleague Bradley Hope, following their claims that Jho Low and his family were spotted in China and Hong Kong in 2018 and 2019

    He also asked why the Malaysian Government had not offered any rewards for individuals with information on Jho Low‚Äôs whereabouts

    Following Hamzah‚Äôs response, Wright claimed that no one in the Malaysian Government is trying to find Jho Low

  • THREE IN FOUR AMERICANS SAY U.S. SHOULD SUPPORT UKRAINE DESPITE RUSSIAN THREATS: REUTERS/IPSOS POLL

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/10/06/three-in-four-americans-say-us-should-support-ukraine-despite-russian-threats

    10/06/2022, 07:33

    50.0% Shortened!

    The polling suggested continuing backing for President Joe Biden's provision of weapons systems, training and other military assistance for President Volodymyr Zelenskiy's government, despite concerns that the war might escalate if Ukraine is provided longer-range weapons that could hit Russia

    The online poll of 1,005 Americans showed that 73% agreed that the United States should continue to support Ukraine, despite Russian warnings that it could make use of its nuclear arsenal

    And in the most recent poll, conducted Oct

    4-5, 66% of respondents said Washington specifically should continue providing weapons to Ukraine, up from 51% in a similar poll in August

    The Biden administration has provided more than $16.8 billion of security assistance to Ukraine since Russia invaded on Feb

    On Wednesday, Russia's ambassador to the United States responded saying Washington's decision to send more military aid to Ukraine poses an "immediate threat" to Moscow's interests, prolongs the bloodshed, and increases the risk of a military clash between Russia and the West

    Russian President Vladimir Putin explicitly raised the specter of nuclear conflict in recent weeks amid Ukrainian battlefield gains, warning the West that he would use all available means to defend Russian territory, including Ukrainian territory annexed by Russia

    And 65% are concerned that the war may escalate if Ukraine is provided longer range weapons that could hit Russia itself

    But fewer Americans believe that Ukraine's problems are not the country's business and that the country should not interfere, with 35% expressing that sentiment, compared with 40% in August

    In the most recent poll, 68% said they were more likely to back a candidate who supports continued military aid for Ukraine, and 72% said they were more likely to support a candidate who supported Ukrainian refugees

    The poll has a credibility interval of plus or minus 4 percentage points

    ['ukrainian', 'russia', 'ukraine', 'say', 'support']

    The polling suggested continuing backing for President Joe Biden's provision of weapons systems, training and other military assistance for President Volodymyr Zelenskiy's government, despite concerns that the war might escalate if Ukraine is provided longer-range weapons that could hit Russia

    The online poll of 1,005 Americans showed that 73% agreed that the United States should continue to support Ukraine, despite Russian warnings that it could make use of its nuclear arsenal

    4-5, 66% of respondents said Washington specifically should continue providing weapons to Ukraine, up from 51% in a similar poll in August

    On Wednesday, Russia's ambassador to the United States responded saying Washington's decision to send more military aid to Ukraine poses an "immediate threat" to Moscow's interests, prolongs the bloodshed, and increases the risk of a military clash between Russia and the West

    Russian President Vladimir Putin explicitly raised the specter of nuclear conflict in recent weeks amid Ukrainian battlefield gains, warning the West that he would use all available means to defend Russian territory, including Ukrainian territory annexed by Russia

  • CO-LIVING TO COPE WITH RISING PROPERTY PRICES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/10/06/co-living-to-cope-with-rising-property-prices

    10/06/2022, 07:33

    45.0% Shortened!

    The space, in a four-storey River Valley shophouse, is about 60sq m in size, as big as a two-bedroom condo unit in the area

    ‚ÄúI considered buying a home, but it‚Äôs a big commitment for the long term and I wanted to explore living in different types of places,‚Äù said Guay, 29, who has been renting the space run by CP Residences since June

    CP Residences chief executive Wendy Yap said the tenant mix across its co-living apartments has changed from one that is being largely composed of foreigners

    ‚ÄúA shift in mindset in the local population towards renting compared with buying, and the time it takes for the young to attain home ownership due to increasing property prices, are some factors that have propelled the increase,‚Äù she said.Those aged 29 to 34 yearn to have their own space away from their family home, and more young couples turn to co-living spaces before buying a flat, Yap added

    Cove co-founder Luca Bregoli said some are ‚Äúimpatient to have their own space and freedom‚Äù, citing couples living at Cove co-living spaces while waiting for their Build-To-Order (BTO) flats

    Co-living spaces offer a good option ‚Äì for her, the draw was the three-month lease term offered by Figment, which manages the co-living space in a heritage shophouse in the city centre

    The S$3,900 (RM12,685)-a-month rent is ‚Äúa lot of money that‚Äôs not going towards a mortgage‚Äù, she noted, but it is worth it

    ‚ÄúMost landlords ask for a two-year lease and I prefer not to commit for so long

    ‚ÄúI also really like (the) aesthetics of the shophouse I‚Äôm living in, it‚Äôs very traditional and has that old charm to it.‚Äù Bregoli said the Covid-19 pandemic has been a major driving factor behind the surge in popularity for co-living spaces

    ‚ÄúWith the new normal of hybrid work and work-from-home, more people value the community and social aspect of shared housing,‚Äù he added

    Thank you for your report! Copyright ¬© 1995-

    ['space', 'living', 'shophouse', 'rent', 'home']

    Craig Burley takes aim at Milan's lack of belief in a 3-0 Champions League defeat against Chelsea

    AC Milan had spells of possession but it was Chelsea who took charge of the match in the second half with goals from Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang and Reece James

    Chelsea delivered in early test of Potter era Potter did not get much of a chance for a settling in period at Chelsea

    But Potter's Chelsea delivered

    And importantly, Kepa Arrizabalaga kept a clean sheet in the Chelsea goal

    Sterling, Aubameyang shine on front line despite Mount frustration Chelsea's front three clicked against AC Milan

    Mount will be desperate to get off the mark this season for Chelsea but it's not for want of trying

    He was a youth product at Chelsea but left the club for AC Milan in 2021 and has established himself as an indispensable part of their team

    The 38-year-old was the first Chelsea player to really get close to Leao and it was his barrage of headers in the first half that gave Fofana a platform to score their opener

    It had to be him! Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang haunts his old club Milan

    They played well in the first half

  • 'SCHOOL FLOWER' BLOOMS INTO BEAUTY QUEEN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/06/school-flower-blooms-into-beauty-queen

    10/06/2022, 07:05

    54.17% Shortened!

    Malaysia‚Äôs newly crowned Miss Tourism 2022 Phoebe Ong‚Äôs favourite subjects in school were Math, Statistics and anything that had to do with numbers

    As she became an adult, Ong decided that she wanted to do something ‚Äúgirly‚Äù for a change and show her feminine side

    Ong, 25, toyed with the idea of taking part in a beauty contest

    The insurance agent finally built up courage and signed up for the Miss Sabah Tourism pageant this year

    She won, thus bringing her to the national level pageant held in Ipoh last month

    ‚ÄúTo my surprise, I won in Ipoh, too,‚Äù said Ong, who spoke of having trouble doing the catwalk and public speaking during her preparations for the competition

    Ong said in Sabah for example, she wished to highlight its nature and friendly people as well as the uniqueness of Sabahans who live peacefully regardless of race and religion

    ‚ÄúI want to tell the world and fellow Malaysians how beautiful Sabah is, how wonderful the people are and the importance of tolerance, mutual respect and love for harmony,‚Äù she said

    However, she wants to also educate locals on the need to maintain their homestays or any tourist sites so that people will want to return for another visit

    Nobody wants to visit a dirty place,‚Äù Ong added

    Miss Malaysia Tourism 2022

    ['beauty', 'love', 'malaysia', 'miss', 'tourism']

    Malaysia‚Äôs newly crowned Miss Tourism 2022 Phoebe Ong‚Äôs favourite subjects in school were Math, Statistics and anything that had to do with numbers

    As she became an adult, Ong decided that she wanted to do something ‚Äúgirly‚Äù for a change and show her feminine side

    Ong, 25, toyed with the idea of taking part in a beauty contest

    The insurance agent finally built up courage and signed up for the Miss Sabah Tourism pageant this year

    She won, thus bringing her to the national level pageant held in Ipoh last month

    ‚ÄúTo my surprise, I won in Ipoh, too,‚Äù said Ong, who spoke of having trouble doing the catwalk and public speaking during her preparations for the competition

    Ong said in Sabah for example, she wished to highlight its nature and friendly people as well as the uniqueness of Sabahans who live peacefully regardless of race and religion

    ‚ÄúI want to tell the world and fellow Malaysians how beautiful Sabah is, how wonderful the people are and the importance of tolerance, mutual respect and love for harmony,‚Äù she said

    However, she wants to also educate locals on the need to maintain their homestays or any tourist sites so that people will want to return for another visit

    Nobody wants to visit a dirty place,‚Äù Ong added

  • NIGHTMARE FOR IPOH FOLK AS FLASH FLOODS HIT AGAIN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/06/nightmare-for-ipoh-folk-as-flash-floods-hit-again

    10/06/2022, 07:05

    52.17% Shortened!

    A villager, Ismail Husin, 72, said he was in his house with his wife when he saw the water level rising at about 8pm on Tuesday

    I don‚Äôt know how badly my house is damaged,‚Äù he said at the centre, adding that the water was almost at knee-level

    Bank employee Mohamed Redwan, 35, said he rushed home when his mother called to say that the water level was rising

    ‚ÄúWhen I got near my housing area, it was impassable and I had to leave my car as the area was flooded

    ‚Äî Bernama ‚ÄúI told my mother to grab whatever was important before we headed to the centre,‚Äù he said

    He added that usually flash floods at the area were not as bad as this

    Many of the residents were still at the centre yesterday as the water receded slowly

    Over at Taman Suria, near Jalan Kuala Kangsar, residents say they now start to worry whenever storm clouds gather

    The area is also prone to flash floods

    ‚ÄúWithin 30 minutes, part of Taman Suria Satu, which is near a retention pond, started to flood,‚Äú she said

    We did not encounter a flash flood until Tuesday,‚Äù she said, adding that the water subsided at about 2.30am yesterday.

    ['resident', 'flash', 'flood', 'centre', 'near']

  • 'I RAN INTO JHO LOW AT NAJIB'S HOME'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/06/i-ran-into-jho-low-at-najibs-home

    10/06/2022, 07:05

    56.0% Shortened!

    Cheah Tek Kuang, who is currently a non-independent and non-executive director of the bank, went over to the Pekan MP‚Äôs home in Langgak Duta as he was tasked to get Najib‚Äôs signature for various forms to open a current account with AmBank

    As he arrived at the residence in a car, Cheah said that Low, better known as Jho Low, came out from another car

    To a question by Najib‚Äôs lead counsel Tan Sri Muhammad Shafee Abdullah during the RM2.28bil 1Malaysia Development Bhd (1MDB) trial yesterday, Cheah said Low did not interact with him

    The witness also testified that prior to the meeting at Najib‚Äôs home, he had met Low before as Low had wanted to meet with him as the bank‚Äôs managing director

    Cheah said the meeting with Low was in a social setting and not for business

    ‚ÄúBut he has a habit of turning up late,‚Äù he said, adding that Low would be late for more than 30 minutes

    After two or three meetings, where Low still turned up late, Cheah said he did not entertain further meeting requests from Low

    On Tuesday, Cheah had testified that the bank account was opened to receive a US$100mil from Saudi Arabia, which he was told was a contribution for Najib‚Äôs work in championing Islam

    Uma Devi who testified that Najib had never made cash withdrawals from his AmBank accounts despite the billions deposited in it

    The same witness also testified that a sum of RM2.08bil flowed in Najib‚Äôs bank account ending 694 through nine transactions in 2013

    Datuk Seri Najib Razak

    ['ambank', 'low', 'najib', 'bank', 'account']

    As he arrived at the residence in a car, Cheah said that Low, better known as Jho Low, came out from another car

    ‚ÄúBut he has a habit of turning up late,‚Äù he said, adding that Low would be late for more than 30 minutes

  • NAJIB SUES GOVT, PRISONS DEPT OVER PARLIAMENT NO-GO

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/06/najib-sues-govt-prisons-dept-over-parliament-no-go

    10/06/2022, 07:05

    42.11% Shortened!

    Thursday, 06 Oct 2022

    He has filed an application for leave to initiate a judicial review of the Prisons Department‚Äôs decision to turn down his request to attend the Dewan Rakyat meeting

    In the notice of application, the Pekan MP named the government, the Home Minister and the Commissioner-General of Prisons as the first, second and third respondents, respectively

    In his supporting affidavit, Najib said the department had rejected his request, citing ‚Äúsecurity grounds‚Äù, on Sept 28

    He then appealed to the Home Minister on Sept 30, along with a request for a quick decision, as the Parliament meeting began on Monday

    However, there has been no response from the Home Minister so far

    Najib, who has been Pekan MP since 1976, said he had been adversely affected by the refusal to let him have access to his officers and aides for the purposes of parliamentary, legislative and constituent work as well as access and attendance in Parliament

    Najib, who was convicted and sentenced in the RM42mil SRC International Sdn Bhd case, said that although his appeal was dismissed at the Federal Court, he remains as Pekan MP

    He said he is entitled to retain his status as Pekan MP until his petition for a royal pardon and review of the Federal Court‚Äôs dismissal of his appeal is decided

    He is seeking for an order of certiorari to quash the commissioner-general‚Äôs refusal as well as a court declaration that he is entitled to have access to his constituency and Parliament

    Thank you for your report! Copyright ¬© 1995-

    ['minister', 'najib', 'prison', 'parliament', 'pekan']

    In the notice of application, the Pekan MP named the government, the Home Minister and the Commissioner-General of Prisons as the first, second and third respondents, respectively

    In his supporting affidavit, Najib said the department had rejected his request, citing ‚Äúsecurity grounds‚Äù, on Sept 28

    He then appealed to the Home Minister on Sept 30, along with a request for a quick decision, as the Parliament meeting began on Monday

    However, there has been no response from the Home Minister so far

    Najib, who has been Pekan MP since 1976, said he had been adversely affected by the refusal to let him have access to his officers and aides for the purposes of parliamentary, legislative and constituent work as well as access and attendance in Parliament

    Najib, who was convicted and sentenced in the RM42mil SRC International Sdn Bhd case, said that although his appeal was dismissed at the Federal Court, he remains as Pekan MP

  • GLOBAL SLOWDOWN TO AFFECT CHIP SECTOR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/10/06/global-slowdown-to-affect-chip-sector

    10/06/2022, 07:03

    56.0% Shortened!

    ‚ÄúIn view of this, we have taken the opportunity to trim our semiconductor sector stocks‚Äô ‚Äì which mainly comprises outsourced semiconductor assembly and test providers Inari Amertron Bhd, Malaysian Pacific Industries Bhd (MPI) and Unisem Bhd ‚Äì 2022 and 2023 revenue and earnings estimates,‚Äù it said

    ‚ÄúAll in all, we downgrade our stance on the semiconductor sector to ‚Äòneutral‚Äô,‚Äù it said

    ‚ÄúWhile most industry research groups still expect positive semiconductor sales growth in 2022, most project an average of 4% year-on-year decline for semiconductor industry sales in 2023, mainly due to an anticipation of a slowdown in the global economy and inventory correction

    ‚ÄúMoreover, we expect softer quarter-on-quarter (q-o-q) industry sales in the third quarter of 2022 (3Q22) due to the weak guidance from 15 global semiconductor chip manufacturers (ex-memory) ‚Äì on average, they project a tepid 1% sequential sales growth in 3Q22,‚Äù it said

    The research house said it also expected the Malaysian semiconductor sector ‚Äì automated test equipment (ATE) and outsourced semiconductor assembly and test (OSAT) firms ‚Äì to register a q-o-q decline of 5% in sales and 8% in net profit on aggregate in 3Q22

    In the same report, CGS-CIMB Research said it was downgrading the Malaysian semiconductor sector from ‚Äúoverweight‚Äù to ‚Äúneutral‚Äù in view of the weaker industry demand and sluggish earnings prospects over the next six to 12 months

    ‚ÄúMalaysian OSAT and ATE sectors trade at 19 times and 23 times 2023 price-to-earnings

    ‚ÄúInari is our sector top pick for Malaysian OSAT due to its higher exposure to the premium smartphone segment and better order visibility from key customer Broadcom

    It has downgraded Unisem from an ‚Äúadd‚Äù to ‚Äúhold‚Äù with a lower target price in view of a sluggish earnings outlook in 2023 and weaker sentiment in the tech sector

    ‚ÄúThe semiconductor industry is significantly reliant on developing technologies for computational power

    Report it to us

    ['semiconductor', 'industry', 'sector', 'research', 'say']

    ‚ÄúAll in all, we downgrade our stance on the semiconductor sector to ‚Äòneutral‚Äô,‚Äù it said

    ‚ÄúWhile most industry research groups still expect positive semiconductor sales growth in 2022, most project an average of 4% year-on-year decline for semiconductor industry sales in 2023, mainly due to an anticipation of a slowdown in the global economy and inventory correction

    ‚ÄúMoreover, we expect softer quarter-on-quarter (q-o-q) industry sales in the third quarter of 2022 (3Q22) due to the weak guidance from 15 global semiconductor chip manufacturers (ex-memory) ‚Äì on average, they project a tepid 1% sequential sales growth in 3Q22,‚Äù it said

    The research house said it also expected the Malaysian semiconductor sector ‚Äì automated test equipment (ATE) and outsourced semiconductor assembly and test (OSAT) firms ‚Äì to register a q-o-q decline of 5% in sales and 8% in net profit on aggregate in 3Q22

  • MAN CITY 5 COPENHAGEN 0: ERLING HAALAND SCORES ANOTHER TWO GOALS AND GETS HALF-TIME REST IN CHAMPIONS...

    https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/20019320/manchester-city-copenhagen-erling-haaland-champions-league/

    10/06/2022, 07:03

    69.44% Shortened!

    And it is becoming a recipe for success for the 22-year-old strike sensation as well as Manchester City

    Another two goals inside the first 32 minutes here took his tally to an incredible 19 in 11 matches with his new club

    That made it 28 goals in this competition for Haaland ‚Äì that‚Äôs the most for any player in their first 30 appearances, even though the Norwegian has only played 22

    A City player was lurking just in case ‚Äì and yeah, you guessed it, it was Haaland

    Surely it was only a matter of time before he claimed another match-ball ‚Äì but then Pep Guardiola had other ideas

    The City boss had been smiling and shaking his head as his ¬£51.4m new boy did the business for him yet again

    Maybe he needs to have a word with his new mate Haaland

    A point in Copenhagen next week will be enough to see City through to the knock-out stages in the New Year with the minimum of fuss

  • 'IT WON'T BE A SURPRISE IF BUDGET IS NOT TABLED TOMORROW'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/06/it-wont-be-a-surprise-if-budget-is-not-tabled-tomorrow

    10/06/2022, 06:36

    54.17% Shortened!

    With widespread talk that Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob will seek the Yang di-Pertuan Agong‚Äôs consent to dissolve Parliament today, observers say that it is not impossible that Budget 2023 could be off the table tomorrow

    ‚ÄúI will not be surprised if the Budget is not tabled this Friday

    In 1999, Parliament was dissolved on Nov 10, 12 days after the Budget was tabled

    As it was not passed, it had to be retabled when the new government was sworn in

    Adib Zalkapli, the director of political consultancy firm BowerGroupAsia, feels that Budget 2023 would still be tabled tomorrow, before Parliament is dissolved

    ‚ÄúTechnically it makes no difference if Parliament is dissolved this week or next week, the Budget would still have not been passed

    ‚ÄúIf elections are held in the next month or so and the Budget is yet to be passed, the new government‚Äôs first order of business would be to table the Budget in the new Parliament.‚Äù ‚ÄúWe saw this in 1999,‚Äù said Adib

    He also pointed out that the then government tabled a smaller Budget on Dec 20, 1999 for more essential spendings, before a full Budget was tabled later in 2000

    Sociopolitical analyst Prof Dr Awang Azman Awang Pawi said it was likely that Barisan would use Budget 2023 on Friday to showcase an election manifesto

    ‚ÄúI think the dissolution will only happen after Budget is presented,‚Äù he said

    ‚ÄúIf the Government loses the Budget 2023 vote, the Prime Minister can use that as a reason to seek dissolution

    ['parliament', 'budget', 'table', 'say', 'election']

  • WILL PARLIAMENT BE DISSOLVED?

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/06/will-parliament-be-dissolved

    10/06/2022, 06:36

    62.07% Shortened!

    It is actually touted as the Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob‚Äôs weekly briefing for the King before the Cabinet meeting and the tabling of Budget 2023 tomorrow

    However, it could turn out to be much more than that

    Over the past few days, talk has been rife that the Budget will not be tabled, defusing the Opposition‚Äôs allegations that the Budget would be tabled just before dissolution, turning it into Barisan Nasional‚Äôs manifesto

    In 1999, Parliament was dissolved immediately after the Budget was tabled

    However, other sources said the tabling of the Budget is on track ‚Äúfor now‚Äù

    But it also depends on the outcome of the Prime Minister‚Äôs meeting with the Yang di-Pertuan Agong, who will have the final say when it comes to dissolution,‚Äù a source said

    Government sources also said preparations to table the Budget are going to plan ‚Äì for now

    Notice has been served to ministers to attend the Cabinet meeting tomorrow, which will be held after the audience with the King

    However, there are also reports that some ministers are already emptying out their offices in anticipation of the dissolution

    Umno sources, meanwhile, said the Prime Minister, who is also a party vice-president, is very likely to seek a dissolution

    ‚ÄúUnless the Prime Minister is planning to have another audience with the King specifically for that purpose, then I believe today will be the day,‚Äù said an Umno supreme council member

    ['minister', 'table', 'budget', 'also', 'dissolution']

  • ASK AN ADVISOR: I'M OVER AGE 72. HOW DO I AVOID THE RMD TAX BITE?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/ask-advisor-im-over-age-161105558.html

    76.09% Shortened!

    I'm over age 72

    What can I do about avoiding the required minimum distribution (RMD) tax bite? I have a steady stream of other income

    As a result, the question of avoiding the tax bite on RMDs is common

    Read on for strategies you can take to ease RMD tax repercussions

    A financial advisor may help you understand how to manage the tax repercussions of your RMDs.¬† Take RMDs Correctly No matter your age, there are proactive steps you can take to prepare for the RMD tax bite

    Tax-deferred accounts are individual accounts, and RMDs cannot be covered for one spouse by taking a distribution from another spouse's account

    If you only have a single IRA or 401(k), you can focus on the amount to distribute

    This provision of the tax code allows account holders to distribute funds directly from their IRAs to a qualified charity, removing the distribution from taxable income

    tax system is progressive, meaning the higher your taxable income, the more tax you pay on each dollar of income

    This can significantly reduce the amount of taxes paid once RMDs begin

    How Do I Avoid the RMD Tax Bite? appeared first on SmartAsset Blog.

    ['distribution', 'rmd', 'tax', 'income', 'account']

    I'm over age 72

    What can I do about avoiding the required minimum distribution (RMD) tax bite? I have a steady stream of other income

    As a result, the question of avoiding the tax bite on RMDs is common

    Read on for strategies you can take to ease RMD tax repercussions

    A financial advisor may help you understand how to manage the tax repercussions of your RMDs.¬† Take RMDs Correctly No matter your age, there are proactive steps you can take to prepare for the RMD tax bite

    Tax-deferred accounts are individual accounts, and RMDs cannot be covered for one spouse by taking a distribution from another spouse's account

    If you only have a single IRA or 401(k), you can focus on the amount to distribute

    This provision of the tax code allows account holders to distribute funds directly from their IRAs to a qualified charity, removing the distribution from taxable income

    tax system is progressive, meaning the higher your taxable income, the more tax you pay on each dollar of income

    This can significantly reduce the amount of taxes paid once RMDs begin

    How Do I Avoid the RMD Tax Bite? appeared first on SmartAsset Blog.

    ['distribution', 'rmd', 'tax', 'income', 'account']



  • US NATIONAL DEBT NOW TOPS $31 TRILLION FOR THE FIRST TIME EVER ‚Äî HERE'S WHO THE COUNTRY OWES

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/us-national-debt-now-tops-210000112.html

    56.0% Shortened!

    The gross national debt in America has hit new heights, surpassing $31 trillion, according to a U.S

    And with the dramatic rise in interest rates over the past few months ‚Äî the Fed funds rate is currently between 3% and 3.35% ‚Äî the national debt will be growing at a rate that makes it even harder to ignore

    Currently, more than $965 million is spent every day just in interest on the national debt

    There are different kinds of national debt

    Think about it like having a credit card, a mortgage and a car payment ‚Äî all debt, but different

    Department of the Treasury manages the national debt, which is split between what one government agency owes to another and debts that are held by the public

    Intragovernmental debt accounts for about $6.5 trillion of the debt

    The much bigger piece of the debt is held by the public

    Right now, that‚Äôs about $24 trillion

    Domestically, the Federal Reserve holds the largest share of the public debt, at about 40%

    Ultimately, rising interest rates will only exacerbate the national debt, making it harder for the government to respond to a slowing economy

    ['national', 'debt', 'trillion', 'interest', 'rate']

    The gross national debt in America has hit new heights, surpassing $31 trillion, according to a U.S

    And with the dramatic rise in interest rates over the past few months ‚Äî the Fed funds rate is currently between 3% and 3.35% ‚Äî the national debt will be growing at a rate that makes it even harder to ignore

    Currently, more than $965 million is spent every day just in interest on the national debt

    There are different kinds of national debt

    Think about it like having a credit card, a mortgage and a car payment ‚Äî all debt, but different

    Department of the Treasury manages the national debt, which is split between what one government agency owes to another and debts that are held by the public

    Intragovernmental debt accounts for about $6.5 trillion of the debt

    The much bigger piece of the debt is held by the public

    Right now, that‚Äôs about $24 trillion

    Domestically, the Federal Reserve holds the largest share of the public debt, at about 40%

    Ultimately, rising interest rates will only exacerbate the national debt, making it harder for the government to respond to a slowing economy

    ['national', 'debt', 'trillion', 'interest', 'rate']



  • THE FED'S REVERSE REPO USE JUST HIT A FRESH RECORD OF $2.4 TRILLION ‚Äî WHY THAT'S ONE OF THE CLEAREST 'BAD SIGNS' FOR THE MARKET

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/feds-reverse-repo-just-hit-174500795.html

    60.71% Shortened!

    There‚Äôs been yet another record-high uptake in the amount of cash investors are stashing in a major Federal Reserve facility

    The Fed parks excess cash reserves from banks in the Overnight Reverse Repurchase Facility

    The RRP facility was hit with $2.367 trillion on Sep

    Enter cash and cash-like assets

    The drop in bill issuance means investors have needed a place to put their spare cash ‚Äî and that place has been the RRP facility

    Since March, experts have been projecting that RRP usage would rise in order to help normalize cash supply levels

    The Fed is currently paying an overnight rate of 3.05% as of Sep

    An increase in the reverse repo rate restricts cash supply and helps to correct inflation

    Uptake in the RRP facility could continue to increase depending on the supply of short-term investments and demand from money market funds, Fed officials noted in the July meeting

    And the bank anticipates that cash and commodities will continue to outperform bonds and stocks

    For the week through Sep

    ['cash', 'investor', 'facility', 'bank', 'rrp']

    The Fed parks excess cash reserves from banks in the Overnight Reverse Repurchase Facility

    The RRP facility was hit with $2.367 trillion on Sep

    Enter cash and cash-like assets

    The drop in bill issuance means investors have needed a place to put their spare cash ‚Äî and that place has been the RRP facility

    Since March, experts have been projecting that RRP usage would rise in order to help normalize cash supply levels

    The Fed is currently paying an overnight rate of 3.05% as of Sep

    An increase in the reverse repo rate restricts cash supply and helps to correct inflation

    Uptake in the RRP facility could continue to increase depending on the supply of short-term investments and demand from money market funds, Fed officials noted in the July meeting

  • BENFICA VS. PARIS SAINT-GERMAIN - FOOTBALL MATCH REPORT - OCTOBER 5, 2022

    https://global.espn.com/football/report?gameId=652630

    10/06/2022, 06:03

    67.65% Shortened!

    Lionel Messi set yet another record with a sublime opening goal but Paris Saint-Germain were held to a 1-1 draw by Benfica in their Champions League clash at the Estadio da Luz in Lisbon on Wednesday

    The goal meant the Argentine superstar became the first player in Champions League history to score goals against 40 different opponents

    Juventus sit in third on three points after they got their first win of the competition at point-less Maccabi Haifa

    Benfica had begun Wednesday's encounter the better team, with their press disturbing PSG's rhythm

    But a moment of brilliance from Messi looked to have turned the game on its head

    All three of PSG's star attacking trio were involved

    Messi drove in from the right and found Mbappe who laid it off to Neymar before the Brazilian put it back into Messi's path for a sumptuous finish

    PSG looked set to take control but some less than resolute defending gave Benfica a chance to draw level

    Messi was substituted in the 81st minute

    Paris Saint-Germain had to settle for a 1-1 draw at Benfica in their Champions League game despite another well-struck goal from Lionel Messi

    Borussia Dortmund struck three times in the first half to beat hosts Sevilla 4-1 in their Champions League Group G match on Wednesday

    ['messi', 'benfica', 'champion', 'league', 'first']

    Craig Burley takes aim at Milan's lack of belief in a 3-0 Champions League defeat against Chelsea

    Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang and Reece James furthered Chelsea's lead to help Graham Potter's side clinch back-to-back victories for the first time this season

    - Chelsea's frontline coming together to give Chelsea key UCL win

    "I thought we had to react well and we did

    We had to suffer as well which is good to do

    "Chelsea versus AC Milan is a fantastic football match and to be involved in it is something I'm grateful for, but to win the match is great

    And Potter's side struck first through summer signing Fofana

    Potter said afterward that Fofana would have a scan on the injury on Thursday

    He could be a Chelsea legend with anybody." A lacklustre Milan failed to threaten Chelsea in the closing stages as Potter's side ran out comfortable victors

    We knew it was going to be a tough game, but mentally, we didn't play as a team." Craig Burley takes aim at Milan's lack of belief in a 3-0 Champions League defeat against Chelsea

    Graham Potter enjoyed his first Champions League victory with Chelsea, but more importantly, it keeps them in the mix for the knockout stages

  • WHY IS THE OPPOSITION LOOKING OUT FOR GOVT'S INTERESTS? SARAVANAN QUESTIONS 'ANGRY RAKYAT' LOGIC

    50.0% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 05 Oct 2022

    Saravanan says if the Opposition felt that conducting polls during the monsoon season would anger the rakyat, they should be more supportive of the idea

    The MIC deputy president said this in questioning the Opposition's protests against plans to hold the 15th General Election (GE15) during the flood season

    "If the current government is making a grave mistake to hold an election during the floods and if the rakyat is truly angry, let them be angry

    ‚ÄúThis would have benefitted them (Opposition)

    ‚ÄúIf Parliament is dissolved in the next couple of days, the general election can be held by the first or second week of November

    The government is ready

    Even if there is an election before November, we are ready

    ‚ÄúWhat we should be worried about is if there is a change in government," he said

    The Tapah MP is also convinced that the public is wise enough to vote for the current government after suffering for 22 months under Pakatan Harapan

    ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think the rakyat will (vote for Opposition)

    So, how do you change the government then? We must maintain the current government,‚Äù he said.

    ['say', 'opposition', 'rakyat', 'election', 'flood']

  • CITY BOYS CONTINUE FAIRYTALE RUN, MAKE IT INTO AFC CUP FINAL

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/football/2022/10/05/city-boys-continue-fairytale-run-make-in-into-afc-cup-final

    10/06/2022, 00:03

    42.11% Shortened!

    Wednesday, 05 Oct 2022

    Kuala Lumpur goalkeeper Kevin Ray Mendoza, making his first start in the AFC Cup, was superb in goal, making six magnificent saves in regulation time

    The game ended 0-0 after regulation and extra time at the Sogdiyana Stadium in Jizzakh, Uzbekistan, on Wednesday (Oct 5)

    In normal time, Sogdiana was the side with the better chances and possession but could not find a way past Kuala Lumpur‚Äôs sturdy defence

    Kuala Lumpur goalkeeper Kevin Ray Mendoza, making his first start in the AFC Cup, was superb in making six saves during that period

    The game entered a penalty shootout to decide who gets to the final to face Omani club Al-Seeb on Oct 22 at the Cheras Football Stadium in Kuala Lumpur

    Kuala Lumpur captain Paulo Josue scored the first penalty to beat goalkeeper Shirinboy Abdullaev

    Midfielder Akram Mahinan scored the fourth penalty, and the winning penalty was taken by defender Giancarlo Gallifuoco

    Javokhir Qakhramanov got the ball rolling for Sogdiana by scoring the first penalty

    Mendoza continued his fine performance when he saved Sogdiana‚Äôs second penalty taken by Shakhboz Jurabekov

    Luka Cermelj scored the third for Sogdiana but it proved too little too late as Gallifuoco brought the City Boys to the final of the continental competition.

    ['kuala', 'lumpur', 'make', 'first', 'afc']

  • IF YOU HAVE THIS MUCH MONEY, YOU DON'T NEED AN ANNUITY

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/much-money-saved-dont-annuity-213145358.html

    66.67% Shortened!

    One of the most common ways to create this income is to buy yourself an annuity

    Essentially, an annuity is an insurance contract

    There will generally be a minimum payment that guarantees you don‚Äôt lose your principal, but it‚Äôs possible that the money won‚Äôt grow at all, which is not a concern with a fixed annuity

    All of this is determined when you buy your annuity contact

    That percentage only ticks up to 95.9% if you use an annuity, not enough of a difference to justify using an annuity

    Social Security Bridge ‚Äì Another Option Morningstar also details an alternative plan for making sure you have enough money in retirement without having to buy an annuity, a strategy known as the Social Security Bridge

    When you turn 70, you file for Social Security

    Once you start taking these payments, you can reduce the amount of money you take out of your retirement accounts each year

    Morningstar analysis, though, shows that if you have at least 36 times your needed annual income saved at the time of retirement, you likely don‚Äôt need to get an annuity

    Retirement Planning Tips The best way to go about planning your retirement is often to get professional help

    Saving in a 401(k) is how most people accumulate money for retirement

    ['income', 'retirement', 'work', 'annuity', 'save']

    One of the most common ways to create this income is to buy yourself an annuity

    Essentially, an annuity is an insurance contract

    There will generally be a minimum payment that guarantees you don‚Äôt lose your principal, but it‚Äôs possible that the money won‚Äôt grow at all, which is not a concern with a fixed annuity

    All of this is determined when you buy your annuity contact

    That percentage only ticks up to 95.9% if you use an annuity, not enough of a difference to justify using an annuity

    Social Security Bridge ‚Äì Another Option Morningstar also details an alternative plan for making sure you have enough money in retirement without having to buy an annuity, a strategy known as the Social Security Bridge

    When you turn 70, you file for Social Security

    Once you start taking these payments, you can reduce the amount of money you take out of your retirement accounts each year

    Morningstar analysis, though, shows that if you have at least 36 times your needed annual income saved at the time of retirement, you likely don‚Äôt need to get an annuity

    Retirement Planning Tips The best way to go about planning your retirement is often to get professional help

    Saving in a 401(k) is how most people accumulate money for retirement

    ['income', 'retirement', 'work', 'annuity', 'save']



  • WHAT TO KNOW ABOUT THE 529 GRANDPARENT LOOPHOLE

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/know-529-grandparent-loophole-130015189.html

    74.42% Shortened!

    A 529 plan can be a powerful way to save for college, offering tax-free growth and other tax benefits

    In the past, there was a downside to a grandparent 529, though

    Here‚Äôs how the grandparent 529 loophole works

    A financial advisor could help you put a financial plan together for your family‚Äôs education needs and goals

    How Grandparent 529 Distributions Were Treated on FAFSA While distributions from grandparent 529s weren‚Äôt directly reported on the FAFSA in the past, they were counted as untaxed student income

    So a large distribution from a grandparent 529 could detrimentally impact their grandchild‚Äôs need-based eligibility because of its treatment as student income

    So let‚Äôs say a grandparent saved $35,000 in a 529 plan to cover one year of college for their grandchild

    That $35,000 distribution would be counted as student income, which would then be reported on the FAFSA, effectively reducing the student‚Äôs financial aid package by $17,500

    Other Benefits of a Grandparent 529 Plan In addition to being a smart way for grandparents to help their grandkids save for college, grandparent 529 plans also have valuable tax and estate planning benefits

    You‚Äôre allowed to change the beneficiary of a grandparent 529 plan as well, and this flexibility can be useful

    Tips for Managing a 529 plan A financial advisor could help you create a financial plan for your family‚Äôs education

    ['plan', 'tax', 'grandparent', 'student', 'fafsa']

    A 529 plan can be a powerful way to save for college, offering tax-free growth and other tax benefits

    In the past, there was a downside to a grandparent 529, though

    Here‚Äôs how the grandparent 529 loophole works

    A financial advisor could help you put a financial plan together for your family‚Äôs education needs and goals

    How Grandparent 529 Distributions Were Treated on FAFSA While distributions from grandparent 529s weren‚Äôt directly reported on the FAFSA in the past, they were counted as untaxed student income

    So a large distribution from a grandparent 529 could detrimentally impact their grandchild‚Äôs need-based eligibility because of its treatment as student income

    So let‚Äôs say a grandparent saved $35,000 in a 529 plan to cover one year of college for their grandchild

    That $35,000 distribution would be counted as student income, which would then be reported on the FAFSA, effectively reducing the student‚Äôs financial aid package by $17,500

    Other Benefits of a Grandparent 529 Plan In addition to being a smart way for grandparents to help their grandkids save for college, grandparent 529 plans also have valuable tax and estate planning benefits

    You‚Äôre allowed to change the beneficiary of a grandparent 529 plan as well, and this flexibility can be useful

    Tips for Managing a 529 plan A financial advisor could help you create a financial plan for your family‚Äôs education

    ['plan', 'tax', 'grandparent', 'student', 'fafsa']

  • A CLEAN SHEET, TRENT‚ÄôS STRIKE & STICK WITH FORMATION? ‚Äì LAST WORD ON LIVERPOOL 2-0 RANGERS

    https://www.thisisanfield.com/2022/10/a-clean-sheet-trents-strike-stick-with-formation-last-word-on-liverpool-2-0-rangers/

    10/05/2022, 21:33

    64.52% Shortened!

    Two dead balls, two goals, one from Trent Alexander-Arnold and another from Mo Salah, secured a needed win against Rangers, opening up a discussion over Liverpool‚Äôs formation

    Here, This Is Anfield‚Äôs Joanna Durkan (@JoannaDurkan_) is joined by fellow writer Sam Millne (@sam_millne) to discuss the win over Rangers, Alexander-Arnold and where next with this formation

    For a player who has looked to lack confidence recently, the game will hopefully act as a springboard and influence Klopp‚Äôs thinking around his formation

    His average position was in his own half with Tsimikas the one to take up a higher position on the flank, keeping Trent to Van Dijk and Matip but still slingshotting forward when the opportunity arose

    There was more help at hand with how Liverpool setup and the balance Liverpool struck was just what was needed to restore confidence and bank a solid showing, as Sam also mentioned

    On occasion, Nunez and Jota did get on top of each other in attacking positions but Klopp has said they have only had one session to work on the system and was impressed with how they have adapted

    It doesn‚Äôt help also that Nunez has admitted he doesn‚Äôt understand the manager particularly well yet so he can only improve

    The double pivot of Thiago and Henderson is perhaps where the system could fall against a team better than Rangers, who can beat Liverpool‚Äôs first line of pressure

    The midfield has lacked in a 4-3-3 and it has left Liverpool vulnerable too many times, and the form the Gunners are in could make for plenty of chances to slice through the team

    I can see Klopp putting Firmino behind Jota in the same formation but I wouldn‚Äôt be opposed to keeping Nunez in the side and taking Jota out for Firmino ‚Äì the good thing is that Liverpool have options

    The system, whichever way Klopp goes, is nothing without the intensity and Liverpool have to bring that on Sunday ‚Äì there‚Äôs a statement win waiting to be had

    ['liverpool', 'klopp', 'well', 'joanna', 'sam']

  • PAKATAN‚ÄôS SHADOW BUDGET 2023: KEY PROPOSALS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/10/05/pakatans-shadow-budget-2023-key-proposals/31887

    10/05/2022, 20:36

    66.67% Shortened!

    ‚ÄúIn addition, provide support for rice farmers in terms of increasing subsidies to RM500 per metric tonne from RM360 per metric tonne and provide monthly aid of RM200 per farmer for a total period of six months as they await harvest,‚Äù the Budget proposed

    To further support SMEs recovery in the post-Covid era, limited to two years only, PH suggested reducing the lowest tax threshold for SMEs to 15 per cent from 17 per cent and the chargeable income subjected to this rate should be increased to the first RM1 million instead of RM600,000

    In addition to generating a spillover economic impact, it will also drive demand for MYR (Malaysian ringgit), complementing the effort to improve our foreign exchange rate.‚Äù Palm oil The palm oil industry, that has been reeling from acute worker shortages, has seen a rise in prices due to the Russia-Ukraine war and Indonesia‚Äôs palm oil export ban

    PH proposed that an RM500 million grant for disbursement to oil palm smallholders to achieve much needed productivity improvements like increasing productivity to enable higher income for oil palm shareholders

    It also suggested, among others, to channel a portion of the windfall profit levy (WPL) from the palm oil industry into a RM500 million green start-up revolving fund for industry and particularly smallholders, to finance their certification, sustainability-green initiatives

    For Sabah and Sarawak, PH said to revert the windfall profit levy to the original rate of 1.5 per cent from the current rate of 3 per cent

    It also proposed the formulation of a National Defence Industry Policy (NDIP) that will serve as a guideline to develop defence science, technology and industry

    We propose that the government assist schools by providing a special capita grant worth RM200 per capita for all schools, regardless of stream

    ‚ÄúIn addition to the per-capita grant, there will be an additional focus on the capacity of schools to meet their operational and capital needs in 2023, ensuring fairness to ‚Äòsekolah kurang murid‚Äô, schools in remote areas, etc

    ‚ÄúTo ensure quality education access to all Malaysians, this grant will be disbursed to all schools including Sekolah Kebangsaan, Sekolah Jenis Kebangsaan Cina (SJKC), Sekolah Jenis Kebangsaan Tamil (SJKT), Sekolah Berasrama Penuh, Maktab Rendah Sains MARA, Sekolah Agama Bantuan Kerajaan, Sekolah Mubaligh, Sekolah Tahfiz, Sekolah Agama Rakyat & Sekolah Agama Persendirian, Sekolah Pondok yang berdaftar, Sekolah Menengah Jenis Kebangsaan, dan Sekolah Menengah Persendirian Cina (SMPC),‚Äù PH suggested among other things

    Budget 2023 will be tabled this Friday.

    ['increase', 'per', 'cent', 'industry', 'school']

  • FOUR, INCLUDING THREE IN A FAMILY, CHARGED WITH MONEY LAUNDERING INVOLVING OVER RM300M IN PENANG

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/10/05/four-including-three-in-a-family-charged-with-money-laundering-involving-over-rm300m-in-penang/31895

    10/05/2022, 20:35

    44.44% Shortened!

    Mohd Mydin, 53, Mohd Nasri Abdul Rahman, 36, Nur Hafeezah Abdul Wahab, 26, and Resool Bivi Yusof Gini, 50, claimed trial to all the charges before Judges Mohammad Khalid Ab Karim and Mazdi Abdul Hamid

    Mohd Nasri, a managing director of an investment company, was charged with a total of 118 charges, while Abdul Wahab, the company‚Äôs chief executive officer, was charged with 30 charges, as well as two charges that were read together with his wife, Resool Bivi, and his daughter, Nur Hafeezah

    All were charged under Section 4(1)(b) of the Anti-Money Laundering, Anti-Terrorism Financing and Proceeds of Unlawful Activities Act 2001, punishable under Section 4(1) of the same Act

    Bail for Mohd Nasri was set at RM500,000 with one surety; Abdul Wahab RM110,000 (one surety); Nur Hafeezah RM25,000 (one surety) and Resool Bivi RM10,000 (one surety)

    Deputy public prosecutor Harris Ong Mohd Jeffery Ong prosecuted, while Abdul Wahab, Resool Bivi and Nur Hafeezah were represented by Mashitah Jamaluddin and Nasri by S

    ['abdul', 'wahab', 'mohd', 'nasri', 'nur']

    Real Madrid have reportedly begun drafting a shortlist of managers to succeed Carlo Ancelotti Madrid legend's Xabi Alonso (L) and Raul Gonzalez are on the shortlist to succeed Ancelotti According to Media Foot, Perez wants a former player - like Zidane - to take charge and has set his sights on duo Raul and Xabi Alonso

    Alonso has also been tipped to succeed Gerardo Seoane as Bayer Leverkusen manager, after the German club's woeful start to 2022-23

    Alonso has also been tipped to succeed Gerardo Seoane as Bayer Leverkusen manager, after the German club's woeful start to 2022-23

    Florentino Perez has began drafting a shortlist of names to succeed current boss Ancelotti Zinedine Zidane won two LaLiga's and three Champions League's while in charge of Madrid The same outlet suggests Perez is also monitoring the situation of Bayern Munich boss Julian Nagelsmann, should he become available in the future

    Nagelsmann fits the profile for Perez's ideal manager and, should Bayern part ways with him, would also be a frontrunner for the Madrid hot seat

    Bayern Munich boss Julian Nagelsmann could also end up at Madrid, should he leave Germany Ancelotti returned to Madrid last summer, after resigning at Everton, to embark on his second stint in charge of the club

    Do you want to automatically post your MailOnline comments to your Facebook Timeline? Your comment will be posted to MailOnline as usual

    Do you want to automatically post your MailOnline comments to your Facebook Timeline? Your comment will be posted to MailOnline as usual We will automatically post your comment and a link to the news story to your Facebook timeline at the same time it is posted on MailOnline

    To do this we will link your MailOnline account with your Facebook account

    We‚Äôll ask you to confirm this for your first post to Facebook

    You can choose on each post whether you would like it to be posted to Facebook

    ['mailonline', 'comment', 'madrid', 'perez', 'post']

    Tsang, 69, addressed the media on Sunday (Oct 2) while the 26-year-old Lebara posted her thoughts on the matter Monday

    Now, actress Maria Cordero has a say on this matter too

    "It is polite to wish someone happy birthday with a birthday kiss

    Eric Tsang only kissed once

    "If I was her, I, too, would post the video on social media

    Otherwise, people wouldn't know who I am," she said, adding that Tsang is not at fault

    Maria Cordero and Eric Tsang co-starred in the comedy 'Men Suddenly In Black'

    On Sept 30, Tsang was caught on video giving Lebara a kiss at the model's birthday party

    The video was shared by Lebara on her Instagram account

    10/05/2022, 19:05

    44.44% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 5 ‚Äî Three Pakatan Harapan (PH) state leaders, namely Negri Sembilan, Selangor and Penang, have agreed to not hold state elections should the federal government decide to hold the general election during the monsoon period

    ‚ÄúThe mentri besar of Negri Sembilan and Selangor and Penang chief minister through DAP‚Äôs secretary-general Anthony Loke have shared their views

    Anwar said it was also decided that the three states will not hold state elections until the flood issues have been resolved, and that would most likely be in February or March

    The Opposition coalition previously said it would be irresponsible for Umno to plan a general election during the monsoon season when severe floods were likely

    On October 1, PH Youth chief Dr Kelvin Yii urged the federal government to stop the ‚Äúmadness‚Äù about holding an early general election when floods are expected

    ['state', 'hold', 'election', 'general', 'say']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 5 ‚Äî Three Pakatan Harapan (PH) state leaders, namely Negri Sembilan, Selangor and Penang, have agreed to not hold state elections should the federal government decide to hold the general election during the monsoon period

    ‚ÄúThe mentri besar of Negri Sembilan and Selangor and Penang chief minister through DAP‚Äôs secretary-general Anthony Loke have shared their views

  • INTERNAZIONALE VS. BARCELONA - FOOTBALL MATCH REPORT - OCTOBER 4, 2022

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/report/_/gameId/652621

    10/05/2022

    60.71% Shortened!

    Ale Moreno breaks down Barcelona's 1-0 loss against Inter, leaving them in jeopardy of missing the UCL knockout stage

    Hakan Calhanoglu scored the only goal of the game at the San Siro in first-half stoppage time to deliver a potentially all-important result in Group C

    Inter and Barcelona will meet again next week, this time at the Camp Nou

    Barcelona have now failed to score in four of their last five Champions League games

    And despite Xavi Hernandez's side having almost 70% possession throughout Tuesday's encounter, it was Inter who had the clearer opportunities on goal in the first half

    Barcelona were unable to clear the ball before it was eventually worked to Calhanoglu who drilled a shot into the bottom corner

    - Xavi outraged over VAR 'injustice' in Inter loss Inter had the ball in the net even earlier, too, only for the offside flag to go up and rule out Angel Correa's effort after he broke clear and rounded Ter Stegen

    Barcelona also survived when a penalty awarded to Inter was called back after an offside in the build-up was spotted by VAR

    It took until the 61st minute for the visitors to seriously threaten the Inter goal

    VAR again frustrated Barcelona in stoppage time at the end of the game

    Time limits and T&Cs apply

    ['barcelona', 'inter', 'champion', 'league', 'group']
